amendment.description: Amendment allows supporters of the commonwealth status quo the option of voting their preference during the second stage of the plebiscite.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-468 to allow supporters of the commonwealth status quo the option of voting their preference during the second stage of the plebiscite.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 179 (Roll no. 234).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 179 (Roll no. 234).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Foxx.
